item.title: Power BI Dashboard Map Creation - Upwork
item.description:
URGENT: We are looking for a skilled Power BI expert who can create a map in a Power BI dashboard. The map should display relevant geographical data and be visually appealing. The ideal candidate should have experience in Power BI and be proficient in map visualizations. Responsibilities include analyzing data, designing and implementing the map, and ensuring data accuracy. The candidate should produce an easy and quick step to step guide. cadindatemust have strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail. This is a great opportunity to showcase your expertise and contribute to our data-driven decision-making process.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$45.00

Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Tableau
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Tableau

item.title: Data Analyst with Power BI and Fabric Experience - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled data analyst with experience in Power BI and preferably Fabric to assist us in building reports using cleaned data from our recruitment CRM. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of data analysis techniques, as well as expertise in visualizing data through Power BI. The main responsibilities will include extracting data from our CRM, cleaning and transforming it as necessary, and creating visually appealing and informative reports using Power BI. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills are paramount, along with excellent attention to detail. If you have a proven track record in data analysis and are proficient in Power BI and Fabric, we would love to hear from you.


Posted On: August 13, 2024 08:19 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Data Visualization, Business Intelligence

item.title: ArcGIS expert to integrate intersecting map feature into existing PowerBI product  - Upwork
item.description:
We have an existing PowerBI site with a map showing states of Australia and the species of animal that can be found in different states (or combinations of states). We wish to add the functionality to intersect state maps with ecosystem maps for different species. For example, for Species A, we want to be able to show mangrove habitat only for Victoria and New South Wales. For Species B, we want to show rainforest habitat only in Queensland etc. We can supply the maps of the different habitats of interest and all necessary data.

Budget: $500
Posted On: August 13, 2024 07:03 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, ArcGIS, GIS, Data Analysis
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, ArcGIS, GIS, Data Analysis
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Data Analyst with Expertise in Excel and Power BI - Upwork
item.description:
About Us:
We are a dynamic tech company focused on leveraging data to drive business insights and innovation. Our team is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of analytics and we are seeking a skilled data analyst to join our growing team.

Key Responsibilities:

- Analyze complex datasets using Excel to generate insights and inform business decisions.
- Develop and maintain Power BI dashboards to visualize key performance indicators.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data needs and deliver actionable insights.
- Ensure data integrity and perform regular audits to maintain accuracy.

Qualifications:

- Proficiency in Excel, including advanced functions and data analysis tools.
- Strong experience in creating interactive dashboards using Power BI.
- Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to communicate complex data findings in a clear and concise manner.

Job Title: SPSS Statistics Project Analyst

About Us:

We are a leading research firm specializing in market analysis and consumer insights. We use data-driven approaches to deliver impactful solutions for our clients.

Key Responsibilities:

- Conduct statistical analysis using SPSS to support various research projects.
- Interpret data and generate reports to present findings to stakeholders.
- Work closely with research teams to design and implement data collection methodologies.
- Provide recommendations based on data analysis to enhance decision-making processes.

Qualifications:

- Proficiency in SPSS and strong statistical analysis skills.
- Experience in handling large datasets and complex statistical models.
- Strong attention to detail and commitment to data accuracy.
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills.

Job Title: Data Analyst Specializing in Excel and SPSS

About Us:

Our company is at the forefront of data analytics in the healthcare industry, aiming to improve patient outcomes through innovative data solutions.

Key Responsibilities:

- Analyze healthcare data using Excel and SPSS to identify trends and insights.
- Prepare detailed reports and presentations to communicate findings.
- Collaborate with healthcare professionals to develop data-driven strategies.
- Ensure compliance with data protection regulations and standards.
-
Qualifications:

- Advanced skills in Excel and SPSS for data analysis.
- Experience in the healthcare industry is a plus.
- Strong analytical mindset with the ability to solve complex problems.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Budget: $5
Posted On: August 13, 2024 05:37 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI, Data Modeling, Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel PowerPivot, Business Intelligence, Data Mining
Skills: Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis, Microsoft Power BI, Data Modeling, Data Visualization, Microsoft Excel PowerPivot, Business Intelligence, Data Mining
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Paginated Report Prints Blank Page - Upwork
item.description:
I have an RDL attached, which continues to render a blank second page.  

Printable area = Report Height - (Top + Bottom Margin) - Header Height.   
I have my report body set to just under the printable area with a Tablix Height less than Printable Area / 3.
My Tablix ALWAYS has three records, and the report is always one page.

I've tried to do this in the flow which renders the .rdl   and in the .rdl iteself.  




Hourly Range: $30.00-$62.00
Posted On: August 13, 2024 05:00 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power Automate, Business Intelligence
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power Automate, Business Intelligence
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Senior Business Analyst - Upwork
item.description:
About Good to Great Schools Australia (GGSA)

Good to Great Schools Australia is a dynamic and supportive organisation committed to improving educational outcomes across Australia. We partner with schools and school systems to guide them on their improvement journey from Poor to Fair, Fair to Good, and Good to Great. Our experienced team provides extensive training, coaching, data monitoring, and tools to ensure each partner school develops capable teachers and delivers effective instruction to every child.

About the Role

As a Business Analyst at GGSA, you will play a critical role in bridging the gap between business needs and technology solutions. You will be responsible for coordinating with senior stakeholders, designers, and development teams to gather and write detailed requirements, ensuring all project outcomes align with our strategic goals. Additionally, you will take on testing responsibilities and oversee organisational reporting to support data-driven decision-making.

Key Responsibilities

Requirement Gathering & Documentation: Collaborate with senior stakeholders to elicit, document, and refine business requirements. Translate these requirements into comprehensive user stories and functional specifications.

Stakeholder Coordination: Act as a liaison between business units, designers, and technical teams to ensure clear communication and alignment throughout the project lifecycle.

Testing & Quality Assurance: Develop and execute test plans, manage testing activities, and ensure all deliverables meet the required quality standards.

Organisational Reporting: Produce and manage regular reports on project progress, KPIs, and other relevant metrics, providing insights to senior management and stakeholders.

Dashboarding & Visualisation: Develop and maintain dashboards using tools like Google Looker and Power BI to provide actionable insights and track key performance indicators.

Risk Management: Identify project risks, develop mitigation strategies, and provide regular status updates to governance bodies.

Additional Responsibilities: Undertake other duties as required, including ad-hoc projects and tasks that align with business needs and contribute to overall organisational success.

About You

Innovative Problem Solver: Capable of creating solutions that meet diverse stakeholder needs while managing ambiguity and complexity.

Customer-Centric: Strong focus on understanding and prioritising the customer journey, ensuring all solutions are aligned with customer needs.

Key Skills and Experience

Educational Background: Tertiary qualifications in Business, Engineering, or a related field.

Experience: Minimum of 3 years in a similar role, such as Business Analyst, Product Owner, or Project Manager.

Methodology Expertise: Strong understanding and practical experience with Agile and Waterfall

Tools Proficiency: Skilled in using JIRA, Confluence, MIRO, Microsoft Teams, and other collaborative tools.

Process Improvement: Demonstrated ability to manage processes effectively, focusing on documentation and continuous improvement.

Communication Skills: Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to engage stakeholders at all levels.

Essential Criteria

User Story Development: Ability to produce well-structured user journeys and write user stories in Gherkin format.

Desired Criteria

Education Sector Experience: Familiarity with educational systems such as LMS and experience in the education sector.

Advanced Problem-Solving: Strong analytical skills and resilience in high-pressure situations.

Why Join Us?

At GGSA, you’ll join a team that values transformation and excellence in education. We offer a collaborative environment with opportunities for professional growth, impacting our partners and shaping the future of education in Australia.

Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00
Posted On: August 13, 2024 04:01 UTC
Category: Business Analysis & Strategy
Skills:Business Modeling, Operational Planning, Needs Assessment, Business Analysis, Financial Analysis, Business Intelligence, Business Plan, Business Process Modeling
Skills: Business Modeling, Operational Planning, Needs Assessment, Business Analysis, Financial Analysis, Business Intelligence, Business Plan, Business Process Modeling
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Data visualization upgrades to an existing dashboard.  - Upwork
item.description:
Hello -
I provide a bi-monthly (every other month) project team health survey. Around 50 survey respondents answer a combination of approximately 25 quantitative and qualitative questions. Four surveys have already been completed and a fifth one is underway. The survey data and dashboard that I have provided to the client has continued to evolve as we continue to have historical data to track and compare. I use surveysparrow as the survey engine. Survey sparrow provides me the raw survey data which I then put into an excel dashboard. I also use both the quantitative and qualitative data to write a report. Although the dashboard I provide serves the clients needs, I want to take the visualization of the dashboard to the next level. I am attaching a sample for your review. I would like the help I get to be a one time thing where I can plug future project data in myself. I have two hours worth of your hourly as my budget. We have five business days from August 14th to complete. Please let me know if this timeline is reasonable and what other things I can clarify.


Posted On: August 13, 2024 03:53 UTC
Category: Scripting & Automation
Skills:Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Google Sheets, Dashboard, Data Analysis, Visualization, VLOOKUP, Macro Programming, Excel Formula, Google Apps Script, Data Analytics, Business Analysis, Data Entry, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization
Skills: Microsoft Excel, Data Visualization, Google Sheets, Dashboard, Data Analysis, Visualization, VLOOKUP, Macro Programming, Excel Formula, Google Apps Script, Data Analytics, Business Analysis, Data Entry, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Utilisation Reports Builder - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Power BI expert to build utilisation reports for our business. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of Power BI and experience in building reports using this tool. The primary responsibility will be to create customised utilisation reports that provide insights into resource allocation and efficiency across various departments. The successful candidate should be able to work independently and have a keen eye for detail.

    Skills required:
    - Proficient in Power BI
    - Data analysis and visualization
    - Strong understanding of SQL
    - Attention to detail

    This is a small-sized project with an estimated duration of 1 to 3 days. We are looking for an intermediate-level expert who can deliver high-quality reports within the given timeline. If you have the expertise and skills required, please apply with your portfolio or examples of previous Power BI reports you have built.

Budget: $300

item.title: Full time Reports and BI Analyst with PowerBI, SQL and programming skills - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a FULL TIME Business Intelligence/Business Analyst, with experience using PowerBI, PowerQuery, Excel, SQL, API usage, and some experience with Python and JavaScript. It's important that you are located in the Pampanga area of the Philippines as this is a HYBRID role and you will be required to work from the office (located in Clark) several days a week.

This position is hybrid (WFH + office) and pays $1,000 USD per month.

We offer a great work environment and an expanding project that offers you the opportunity to contribute with your skills and the challenge of learning something new everyday.

If you have a passion for technology, love learning, have a fire in you to change the world, and you are located near Clark, please reach out so we can talk.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

• Collect and analyse data to develop insights and recommendations for business decisions.
• Create and maintain reports and dashboards to track KPIs, scorecards and identify trends.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and requirements for reporting and analysis.
• Develop and implement data quality checks to ensure accuracy and consistency of data.
• Identify opportunities for process improvement and automation to increase efficiency and effectiveness of reporting.
• Communicate findings and insights to stakeholders through presentations and written reports.
• Collaborate with operational leaders, to generate and/or modify reports to highlight potential root causes to key issues as they arise
• Support the implementation of process changes, automation, and improvements.
• Collaborate with change management teams to ensure successful adoption of new practices.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in reporting and analytics.
• Manage projects and collaborate with cross-functional teams to successfully deliver projects from initiation to completion.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: August 12, 2024 22:16 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:API Integration, JavaScript, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, SQL, Data Visualization, Python, Microsoft Excel
Skills: API Integration, JavaScript, Microsoft Power BI, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, SQL, Data Visualization, Python, Microsoft Excel
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Data Analysis Task: Measuring article success rate - Upwork
item.description:
This task should not take more than 3-4 hours or its taking too long

So there is a task to measure the success of news articles which are published for example; but through third parties.
Now success is based on number of clicks, time spent, site interactions and even textual matches.
The stories; we have info about the headlines, topics and number of whilst also we have which third party used it.
So we could beyond Excel which is foundation; we should Power BI and ideally Python data science librariers to give as much insight as possible for future growth and what is happening now.

You'll do the task with me as I re-learn powerbi dax calc and python libraries and able to fully understand; via Zoom/Meets or similar (its partially a learning excercise).

But beyond basic key metrics is a must, we must show what more we can do - especially from a business point of view. I need to hire in the next day or two so please hurry.

item.title: Build Power Apps and Power BI Dashboards - Upwork
item.description:
Hi folks...in summary we are short staffed due to two new customers. One in Brazil and one in the USA. This is a convert-to-hire opportunity in either country. This is also a sub-contract opportunity in either country.

Domain of work:  Our customers look to us to apply AI/ML within their supply chain and S&OP processes. The USA customer is heavy manufacturing.  As a Microsoft Startup, and now Microsoft Partner, we do this with a combination of technologies but prefer Microsoft in the absence of any specific custosmer preference.

Deadline: None. Work is continuous like a service desk, not like typical software development.

Existing Team:  Solution Architect, Data Engineer, Data Scientist, Azure Engineer.  Other part-time help will be drawn from company.  The UX Engineer (you) would be expected to work closely with the team.  The work is mostly remote. By mostly I mean that the team gets together in either Brazil or USA a couple times a year to both work and have some team building fun. More on-site work with me in Rhode Island a plus.  When working remote we generally hang on Teams together for 2 hours each morning, and 2 hours each afternoon to collaborate and help each other.

Scope of work:   Primarily Power App and Power BI development.  Maybe some Flow/Automate work. Mockups of each "screen" will be provided for clarity of requirements. While you are welcome to also help with data engineering, it is not needed. Everyone else on team has data engineering skills.

Required experience:  This is hard to estimate. People are different. We will provide mock-ups of screen layouts in Power BI and Power Apps, so less experience is needed. Depends on your proficiency. In Power Apps the mockups would also cover navigation path.

Hourly Range: $17.00-$35.00
Posted On: August 12, 2024 20:25 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:Microsoft Power BI Development
Skills: Microsoft Power BI Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Proactive Data Analyst for Youth Activity Centers Projects | Make a real impact with us! - Upwork
item.description:
Are you the A player we're looking for?

If you thrive on making a real impact and improving business processes, we'd love to connect!

We're a growing Automation Agency looking for a proactive, detail-oriented Data Analyst who wants to work with well-organized data to create impactful reports and dashboards for our clients.

This role is ideal for someone who enjoys applying their skills to real-world business processes and wants to grow in a dynamic industry.

Our projects focus on automating core business processes for Youth Activity Centers—such as dance, music, and acting schools—by integrating their tech stack and maximizing its potential.

Unlike larger companies where processes are rigid and data quality often suffers, we work closely with our clients to ensure their data is clean, well-organized, and stored properly.



What You'll Do:

-Create and maintain reports and dashboards to provide actionable insights for our clients.
-Audit existing data and systems to ensure accuracy and consistency.
-Offer insights on how to enhance data processes and improve data quality.
-Collaborate with our team to brainstorm innovative solutions and share knowledge.


What We Offer:

-Training and Frameworks: You’ll receive all the necessary resources and training to understand how to implement the client's project.
-Growth Opportunities: We’re looking for exceptional people to grow with us. If we’re a good fit, there’s potential for long-term collaboration.
-Quality Data: Work with well-organized, clean data and have the opportunity to improve client processes.


About You:

-You hate inefficiency and are excited about the growing Automation field.
-Enthusiastic about activities like music, dance, or sports.
-Based in Europe, to ensure smooth team coordination.
-Familiar with data sources like CRM systems and spreadsheets.
-Proficient with tools like Power BI and Google Data Studio.
-Proficient with SQL language.


Ready to make a difference and grow in the Automation industry?

Apply now! Start your cover letter with the word “acciuga” and tell us why you're passionate about data analysis. Share a project you enjoyed and explain why you think you're a great fit for our team.




Posted On: August 06, 2024 11:08 UTC
Category: Data Analytics
Skills:SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Operations Analytics, Marketing Analytics, Sales Analytics, Dashboard, Query Development, Report, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis
Skills: SQL, Microsoft Power BI, Operations Analytics, Marketing Analytics, Sales Analytics, Dashboard, Query Development, Report, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis
Country: Spain

item.title: Sales Dashboard Developer in Power BI - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

We are looking for a freelance developer skilled in Power BI to create a detailed sales dashboard. The dashboard should:

Show sales per employee in different periods and allow comparisons.
Categorise and cross-categorise product data with multiple categories.
Explore results by product category.
Requirements:

Proficient in Power BI and data visualisation.
Experience in integrating and filtering data from multiple sources.
Ability to create complex metrics and detailed calculations.
Fluent in Spanish to understand and follow instructions perfectly.
Full availability and willingness to report progress regularly.
Responsibilities:

Data Integration:

Filter and sort data from provided files.
Create new tables and specific fields (e.g., product codes and descriptions).
Dashboard design:

Implement date and category selectors to segment and compare data.
Create detailed visualisations and sales comparisons, including simple metrics tables and breakdowns by category and time.
Metrics and Visualisations:

Develop charts with key metrics such as recommended sales, tickets, and referral evolution.
Display aggregated data and breakdowns by employee and product categories.
Deliverables:

Final dashboard in Power BI.
Documentation and user guide.
Delivery time: 2 weeks

Additional:

The contracting party will provide a detailed manual with step-by-step instructions to follow in the development of the project.



Budget: $700
Posted On: August 12, 2024 19:43 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis
Skills: Microsoft Power BI, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Excel, Data Analysis
Country: Spain

item.title: PowerBI developer - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a full-time Data Engineer or BI Developer to design and implement a new ETL pipeline to replace existing Power BI reports. The ideal candidate will have experience with tools like Airflow, Meltano, and Hevo. They will manage data integration from 30 different sources and ensure seamless storage in BigQuery and Azure SQL. The role involves optimizing and maintaining data pipelines for performance and reliability. Collaboration with the BI team is essential to transition reports to the new system. Strong SQL skills and experience with cloud-based data storage are required. The candidate should be open to discussing and adapting the technology stack as needed. Problem-solving and communication skills are critical for working effectively with stakeholders. Familiarity with Power BI and other BI tools is preferred. This position offers competitive compensation and the opportunity to work in a dynamic environment.

item.title: Create Power BI Visual - Upwork
item.description:
I need a visual that does has the following requirements
- Slicer
- Hierarchical Layout of Multiple Data Fields
- Conditional Formatting for each individual value

The native Slicer allows for the first two features: slicing and hierarchical layout of multiple data fields. But you cannot conditionally format each individual value. See attached HierarchySlicer.png

The native SlicerNew allows for the first and third feature: slicing and conditional formatting for each individual value. But you cannot select multiple data fields and show them as a hierarchy. See attached SlicerNew.png and SlicerNewAccentBarColorRule.png

The xviz Hierarchy Filter is exactly what I want, except that it conditionally formats based on a measure instead of a field value. See https://xviz.com/visuals/hierarchy-filter/
It also cost $10k per year which is too expensive.

I would prefer to use a native visual, not a custom one. But if this is not possible, I can accept visuals from 3rd party, a custom visual, or a visual created using Deneb. See https://deneb-viz.github.io/

I have included data.csv with sample data for testing.

For deliverables, I expect a .pbix file that uses data.csv and the visual that meets the three requirements.

This project must be completed by end of the day Thursday CST.


Hourly Range: $30.00-$100.00
Posted On: August 12, 2024 16:40 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI Development, Data Visualization
Skills: Dashboard, Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI Development, Data Visualization
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Power BI Expert - Upwork
item.description:
Power BI Expert (Part-Time)

Are you a data visualization maestro? Do you love transforming raw data into insightful dashboards and reports? We're searching for a passionate and skilled Power BI expert to join our team on a part-time basis!

Responsibilities:
Design and develop interactive and visually appealing Power BI reports and dashboards. Your creations will be the envy of the data visualization world!
Connect to various data sources, cleanse and prepare data for analysis. You'll be a data wrangler, transforming raw data into a beautiful, usable format.
Implement data modeling techniques to create meaningful and insightful visualizations. You'll know how to tell a compelling story with data.
Collaborate with stakeholders to understand their requirements and translate them into effective Power BI solutions.
Provide technical documentation and support for created reports and dashboards.
Stay up-to-date with the latest Power BI features and best practices.

Requirements:
Proven experience in designing and implementing Power BI reports and dashboards. Show us your portfolio!
Strong understanding of data visualization principles and best practices. You know how to make data sing!
Excellent knowledge of Power Query, DAX, and Power BI Desktop. You're a Power BI master!
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines. You're a self-starter who can manage your time effectively.
Strong communication and presentation skills. You can explain your work clearly and convincingly.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$15.00
Posted On: August 12, 2024 15:42 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, Presentations, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Modeling, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI Development, Business Intelligence
Skills: Dashboard, Presentations, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Modeling, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization, Microsoft Power BI Development, Business Intelligence

item.title: Grafana Expert / Configuration / Data Linking / Data Visualization with Grafana / Advisory  - Upwork
item.description:
I have a significant amount of data in Influx Databases and I need to visualize the information.

1. I don't need fancy
2. I do want easily readable, explorable, and filterable
3. I need to look for clever ways so I don't need to maintain tons of different reports for different users.  For example if all the data is the same,  I want to have the login for Unit 1, show Unit 1 data,  for Unit 2 show Unit 2 data.
4. Good at communications
5. I REALLY need good alerting to SMS, Telegram and WhatsApp.
6. Someone who gives good advice based on experience.  If its a dumb idea, say something.

I work with our dev team for years so its not huge work, but it will grow.  Initially it will be us sitting online together pulling together some basic views.
7. Ideally someone who can work in the mornings EST or evenings EST.
8. WhatsApp, or Signal user.  I am global and travelling so easy communications is key.


Posted On: August 12, 2024 14:17 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Dashboard, API Integration, Grafana, Data Visualization
Skills: Dashboard, API Integration, Grafana, Data Visualization
Country: United States

item.title: Power BI Expert Needed to Convert Excel Sales Dashboard - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled Power BI expert to help us convert our existing Excel sales dashboard into a Power BI dashboard.

Our current Excel dashboard allows us to view:
- Sales by account, by rep, and by product
- Quantity and total money made
- Number of orders
- Average order value
- Various charts and filters based on territory, area, rep, and account

We want to replicate these features in Power BI, with the added benefit of syncing our data directly to the dashboard, eliminating the need for manual data input. We typically receive CSV data extracts and adjust them to fit our Excel dashboard, but we need this process automated in Power BI.

While we will handle the data transfer to Power BI, your expertise is welcome in ensuring a smooth transition and optimal dashboard functionality.

Please provide a rough estimate of how many hours you anticipate this project will take.

Hourly Range: $25.00-$45.00
Posted On: August 12, 2024 13:37 UTC
Category: Data Visualization
Skills:Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization
Skills: Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Power BI, Data Visualization, Data Analysis, Business Intelligence, Microsoft Power BI Data Visualization
Country: United States
click to apply
